meanings.definition: Being the greatest or highest possible
meanings.sent1: The cake had a maximal amount of frosting on top.
meanings.sent2: She reached her maximal speed while running in the race.
meanings.sent3: The maximal number of balloons made the room look like a colorful cloud.
meanings.sent4: His maximal effort in studying paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent5: The maximal mountain peak was covered in snow, shining in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or constituting a maximum
meanings.sent1: The maximal weight allowed on the elevator was clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: The maximal capacity of the stadium was reached during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The maximal number of players on the team caused a bit of chaos during practice.
meanings.sent4: Her maximal energy level during the performance was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The maximal volume on the radio made the song sound even more exciting.
